column4: hey all, newbie here, i've looked at tutorials and all, been all over the net, i guess my brain isn't so fast after a;;. can someone please walk me through now to install a package i download? thanks in advance.
either SYSTEM > ADMINISTRATION > SYNAPTIC PACKAGE MANAGER ... or for simple programs  APPLICATIONS > ADD REMOVE
you are downloading a Windows executable ... you need WINE in order to see if it can run on Linux
no no i downloaded a package and it got as far as allowing me to install and then... full stop. i'll give pidgin a try. thanks
